query:
ALTER TABLE scheduled_reports 
ADD COLUMN report_type ENUM('spc_summary', 'cpk_analysis', 'violation_report', 'production_line_status', 'ai_vision_dashboard') DEFAULT 'spc_summary' AFTER user_id;
command:
